content: this legal text summarizes a court case in rome where a community of property between two parties referred to as ri mo gh and ri be has been dissolved the court has assigned ownership of a specific apartment to mo gh and ownership of a ground floor box with an exclusive courtyard to ri be additionally mo gh has been ordered to pay compensation to ri be for the occupation of the property the court considered the value of the properties and the shares of ownership held by each party with the assistance of a courtappointed expert witness who provided a report on the value of the properties and proposed a division the court also addressed the division of movable property and rejected the plaintiffs claim furthermore the court awarded compensation for the loss of enjoyment of the property and litigation costs to both parties the ruling was made on may 29 2017 and filed in the clerks office on january 7 2017
